CustomField.description: Indicates the last time a Reseller Contact was reached out to via call or event as either a connect or attempted connect directly on the Reseller Account or a related opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the last time a Reseller Contact was reached out to via call or event as either a connect or attempted connect directly on the Reseller Account or a related opportunity.
CustomField.label: Last Rep Activity Date
